title: Fix documentation mismatch - add real estate features to docs
description: Critical: Documentation only describes blog features but codebase has 3 undocumented real estate entities (agent, apartment, city). Update README, CONTENT-STRUCTURE.md, API.md to reflect dual-purpose (blog + marketplace).
close_reason: Documentation updated with comprehensive real estate features - added apartment, agent, and city entities to README, CONTENT-STRUCTURE, and API docs

title: Add custom business logic and API enhancements
description: Move beyond basic CRUD: add search/filtering (apartments by price/location), computed fields (price per sqft), custom endpoints (featured listings, agent stats), email notifications, image optimization.

title: [Context] Vibe Kanban Web Companion Integration
description:
# Vibe Kanban Web Companion Integration

## What It Is
The Vibe Kanban Web Companion is a React component that provides real-time project tracking and task management capabilities within the Strapi admin panel.

## Integration Details

### Package
- **Name**: `vibe-kanban-web-companion`
- **Version**: `^0.0.5`
- **Package Manager**: Bun (primary), npm (fallback)

### Key Files
- `src/admin/app.tsx` - Strapi admin customization entry point
- `package.json` - Dependency declaration
- `bun.lock` - Lockfile for Bun package manager

### Implementation
Located in `src/admin/app.tsx`:
```tsx
import type { StrapiApp } from '@strapi/strapi/admin';
import { VibeKanbanWebCompanion } from 'vibe-kanban-web-companion';

export default {
  bootstrap(app: StrapiApp) {
    // IMPORTANT: Must return JSX element, not component type
    app.registerHook('Admin/Root', () => <VibeKanbanWebCompanion />);
  },
};
```

### Architecture Notes
- **Framework**: Strapi 5.33.2 (headless CMS)
- **Hook**: Uses Strapi's `Admin/Root` hook to inject at app root
- **Rendering**: Client-side only (Strapi admin is CSR, no SSR concerns)
- **Integration Point**: Renders at the highest level of admin UI hierarchy

## Common Tasks

### Updating the Component
```bash
bun update vibe-kanban-web-companion
npm run build  # Verify Strapi build
```

### Troubleshooting
1. **Component not appearing**: Ensure JSX syntax `() => <Component />` not `() => Component`
2. **Build failures**: Run `npx tsc --noEmit` to check TypeScript errors
3. **Hook errors**: Check Strapi version compatibility with `Admin/Root` hook

### Verification Commands
```bash
npx tsc --noEmit           # Type-check
npm run build              # Build Strapi admin
npm run dev                # Start development server
```

## Related PRs
- #6: Initial integration and reviewer feedback fix

## Future Work
- Monitor for companion updates
- Consider additional hooks if more integration points needed
- Track usage patterns and user feedback

title: Add Virtual Tour & 360-degree View Support
description: Enable 3D virtual walkthroughs for property listings. Integrate Three.js or a 360-viewer for immersive user experience.

title: Implement AI-Powered Personalization Engine
description: Analyze user behavior (saved listings, search patterns) to provide personalized property recommendations. Integrate with Gemini API for behavioral analysis.

title: Predictive Market Analytics Dashboard
description: Provide insights into future property values, rental yields, and neighborhood growth trends using historical data and AI models.

title: Add Russian/English language support for agent, city, apartment entities
description: Implement i18n support using Strapi's native plugin to enable English and Russian translations for Agent, City, and Apartment entities. This includes configuring the plugin, marking appropriate fields as localizable, and documenting the API usage.
close_reason:
Completed i18n implementation for Agent, City, and Apartment entities. PR #16 is ready for review with all reviewer feedback addressed. Implementation includes:
- Enabled Strapi i18n plugin with en/ru locales
- Configured admin panel for English and Russian
- Added localization to Agent (name, bio), City (name, country, region, description), and Apartment (title, description, address)
- Created comprehensive API documentation with i18n examples
- All tests passing (30/30)
- Addressed @gemini-code-assist review feedback on API filtering example
PR: https://github.com/zaebee/market-miniapp/pull/16

title: TypeScript migration - enable strict mode and add type safety
description: Enable strict mode in tsconfig, create type definitions for all content types, add type-safe API response types, implement runtime validation (Zod/io-ts), create shared types package for frontend consumption.

title: Implement n8n Integration Backend Support
description: Backend updates to support n8n integration, including schema changes (currency, rooms, external_id, seo_title, area_total), locale additions (cs, pl), and security dependencies.

title: Configure Vercel Deployment
description: Setup project configuration for deployment to Vercel.

title: Add comprehensive test suite with Jest and CI/CD pipeline
description: Critical: Zero testing infrastructure exists. Add Jest+Supertest for unit/integration tests, configure test database, add GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline. This enables confident refactoring and prevents regressions.

title: Blockchain-Based Property Verification Log
description: Create a transparent, immutable log for property title history and verification using blockchain principles (or a simplified ledger).

title: Smart Scheduling & Agent Matchmaking System
description: Allow users to book property viewings directly. Match users with agents based on property type and location. Integrate with calendar APIs.

title: Implement validation, rate limiting, and security hardening
description: Add required field validation, rate limiting middleware (koa-ratelimit), input sanitization, custom validators, security headers (helmet.js), proper CORS config. Document in SECURITY.md.
